hero.roles: Data Analyst | Fullstack Developer | Tech Freelancer
hero.desc: I'm an 8th-cycle Computer Science student focused on data, web apps and automation.

projects.title: Projects & Experience
projects.experience_desc: During my academic and freelance journey, I've built and automated multiple solutions using Angular, Python, and Shopify. More coming soon!

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm an 8th-cycle Computer Science student from Peru, passionate about data analysis, automation, and scalable web applications. My academic background has allowed me to participate in projects involving artificial intelligence, scraping, dashboards, and fullstack development.
about.subtext: Outside of academics, I've worked as a freelancer building websites, automating processes, and designing solutions with Angular, Python, and Shopify.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.text: I'm open to freelance projects, collaborations, or simply sharing ideas. Feel free to reach out!

items.description: Designed and maintained websites for three emerging brands, tailored for different market segments, including UI/UX and responsiveness.
items.tech: Tech stack: Angular, TailwindCSS, WordPress, Shopify

items.description: Collected and organized client data using scraping tools and visual software to support database expansion for commercial prospects.
items.tech: Tech stack: Python, Selenium, Excel, Visual scraping tools
